name: H4LF L1F3
description:
Controls:

Up, Down, Left, Right, Space

In the nearby future the immune system of the humankind was threatened by new diseases from space. The unknown new life forms were destroying body cells putting in danger the survival of the human being. Then the world scientists had to create the nanorobots aimed to fight with the earth envaders.This is a story about one of our defenders. The robot named H4LF...

This game is made for the #LOWREZJAM2016 with a resolution of 64x64 pixel

... and it's my first experience in game development :)

You can see the accelerated process of creating art for the game here (14h = 22 min)

Art and animation: Alex Serada

Programming: Igor Gritsenko

Music: OXID

Tools:

Aseprite

Pyxel Edit

Construct 2
